docs.snippet: The N.B.A. formally charged the owner of the Los Angeles Clippers with conduct that has hurt the league and set up a timetable to remove him....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. formally charged the owner of the Los Angeles Clippers with conduct that has hurt the league and set up a timetable to remove him.
docs.abstract: NBA takes the next step in its attempt to terminate Donald Sterling’s ownership of Los Angeles Clippers by formally charging him with conduct that has adversely affected the league and establishing a timetable for his potential ouster.

headline.main: Clock Ticks on Sterling’s Potential Removal
headline.print_headline: Clock Ticks on Sterling’s Potential Removal

byline.original: By ANDREW KEH and SCOTT CACCIOLA

docs.snippet: As the Indiana Pacers have stumbled through a rocky end to the regular season and erratic performances in the postseason, center Roy Hibbert has been a focus of concern....
docs.lead_paragraph: As the Indiana Pacers have stumbled through a rocky end to the regular season and erratic performances in the postseason, center Roy Hibbert has been a focus of concern.
docs.abstract: Turnaround of Indiana Pacers center Roy Hibbert has stabilized team in playoff series against Miami Heat; Hibbert had gone without a rebound or a point in two playoff games.

headline.main: Hibbert’s Turnaround Helps Stabilize the Erratic Pacers
headline.print_headline: Turnaround by Center Stabilizes the Pacers

docs.snippet: Tim Duncan scored 27 points, and the host San Antonio Spurs took advantage of Serge Ibaka’s absence to dominate the paint, beating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals opener....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan scored 27 points, and the host San Antonio Spurs took advantage of Serge Ibaka’s absence to dominate the paint, beating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Western Conference finals opener.
docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs defeat Oklahoma City Thunder, 122-105, to take Game 1 of NBA Western Conference finals; other news noted.

headline.main: Duncan and Spurs Rout Thunder in Game 1
headline.print_headline: Duncan and Spurs Rout Thunder in Game 1

docs.snippet: National Basketball Association Commissioner Adam Silver said on Tuesday he would prefer to let Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling sell his team "on a reasonable timetable" rather than proceed with trying to forcibly terminate his ownershi...
docs.lead_paragraph: National Basketball Association Commissioner Adam Silver said on Tuesday he would prefer to let Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling sell his team "on a reasonable timetable" rather than proceed with trying to forcibly terminate his ownership.

headline.main: NBA Commissioner Signals Willingness for Deal With Clippers Owner
headline.print_headline: NBA Commissioner Signals Willingness for Deal With Clippers Owner

docs.snippet: The National Basketball Association (NBA) stepped up its drive to oust Donald Sterling as owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, formally charging on Monday that his racist remarks damaged the league and paving the way for fellow team owners to decide...
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Basketball Association (NBA) stepped up its drive to oust Donald Sterling as owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, formally charging on Monday that his racist remarks damaged the league and paving the way for fellow team owners to decide his fate next month.

headline.main: NBA Formally Charges Clippers Owner, Sets June 3 Hearing
headline.print_headline: NBA Formally Charges Clippers Owner, Sets June 3 Hearing

docs.snippet: The Golden State Warriors wanted Steve Kerr from the start but still wondered about his ability to coach. Kerr had his own questions for the Warriors before being convinced to take the job, notably what led to the bitter divorce between the team a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors wanted Steve Kerr from the start but still wondered about his ability to coach. Kerr had his own questions for the Warriors before being convinced to take the job, notably what led to the bitter divorce between the team and Mark Jackson.

headline.main: Warriors Introduce Steve Kerr as New Coach
headline.print_headline: Warriors Introduce Steve Kerr as New Coach
